sentences.english: Once again, he had forced back the Army of the Potomac.
sentences.chinese: 他再一次地强令召回了波托马克河的部队。

sentences.english: A Bivouac Fire on the Potomac.

sentences.english: Across an expanse of the Potomac floodplain, airplanes were landing at National Airport.
sentences.chinese: 跨过宽阔的波托马克河漫滩，飞机在国家机场降落。
